A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What's make a good movie is a the story. Once you have your story you can built around had whatever special effect or characters on it. The Last Jedi just forgot this simple rule. Who ever was in charge of the script didn't do is job. None of the new characters are interesting and the two Legends Luke and Laia look so... old and tired. So please for the next one do your homework start with the story.
